attributes.action: stop the proposed 125,000 extra flights a year that are to be allowed through Heathrow Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These additional 125,000 flights (which will be allowed if this new runway is built) will, quite obviously, contribute greatly to both C0₂ emissions and noise pollution for the greater surrounding areas.

The British government has vowed to reduce this country's Carbon output significantly by the year 2050, but many environmental experts have said that by then the real damage could already have been done and that the British government (or any government) needs to change their target year to around 2020.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
